Ever since the Justice League had sent their Team to ruin an operation of the Shadows, someone had to get on the inside. "I could really use some air." You say to yourself as you drop from your place. When you land, you look around and see that there's a girl with blonde hair and a green suit looking at you suspiciously. " Who are you and how'd you get into the Cave?" She asked. Obviously, you know who this is. "Artemis." You rudely spit at her. The archer does not take this insult so lightly as she grabs you by the collar. "I dare you to say that again." She threatens. You gulp and look around, first the room, and then, ooh, her feet. They look so beautiful! You think to yourself. Artemis takes notice and looks down. You gulp again as she chuckles. "Okay, I know what you want. I see that you like my feet a lot." She teases.
